description: Serve these comforting sliders loaded with macaroni and cheese and coleslaw at your next gathering â€“ and make sure you have enough for seconds!
name: Speedy Macaroni And Cheese Sliders Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 280g Kraft Easy Mac & Cheese Macaroni Pasta Classic Cheese Box
2 tbs F. Whitlock & Sons Chipotle Barbecue Bbq Sauce 250ml

recipeInstructions.text: Empty macaroni-and-cheese sachets into a large microwave-safe bowl. Add 2 cups water. Microwave on high for 5 minutes, stirring, or until liquid is absorbed and pasta tender. Stand for 2 minutes.
Meanwhile, split buns and toast until golden.
Combine coleslaw and dressing from the packet in a large bowl.
Place bun bases on a board. Top with coleslaw, followed by macaroni-and-cheese. Drizzle with barbecue sauce and sandwich with bun top. Serve.
